  • Simpatico - Simulation Package for Polymer and Molecular Liquids

Extending Simpatico

Users may extend the capabilities of Simpatico by writing new subclasses of a set of base classes that represent various elements of a simulation, such as molecular species, diagnostics, file formats, and Monte Carlo or molecular dynamics algorithms. This section provides guide for how to integrate such new classes into operation of Simpatico.
